100% Uptime or 2 MONTHS FREE – GUARANTEED!
75% OFF FIRST 3 MONTHS!

Uptime is critical when running a business, cultivating an online community, or delivering a web application to market. Unfortunately, although most hosts make seemingly bold commitments, the industry seldom holds businesses accountable for their promises, excusing downtime as something that “Just Happens.”

At e-Sensibility, we find downtime UNACCEPTABLE, and here's how we aim to prevent it:

All customers are provisioned on High-End Nodes utilizing SAN-Based Storage:

Our Servers:

CPU: Dual Quad Intel E5520 “Nahalem” 2.26GHz
RAM: 24 GB RAM

Our Storage:

Production: Fully redundant 15k SAS iSCSI SAN-Based Storage with multiple RAID controllers, multiple power supplies, and no single point of failure

Backup: Separate iSCSI RAID-10 Backup Storage

====================================

e-Sensibility Offers REBOOTLESS SECURITY UPDATES to maximize stability, security, and uptime:

http://e-sensibility.com/rebootless-updates.html
